snippet: Her family vowed to appeal after the tribunal dismissed their demands to revoke Peggy Guggenheim’s donation to the foundation.
abstract: Her family vowed to appeal after the tribunal dismissed their demands to revoke Peggy Guggenheim’s donation to the foundation.

headline.main: Paris Court Rejects Guggenheim Descendants' Claim Over Venice Palazzo
headline.print_headline: Peggy Guggenheim’s Family Loses Suit Over Palazzo Art
